ValidationRule.description: We would like a validation rule added to contracts for demo hardware. This will help prevent renewal reps from creating renewal opportunities and quotes and working and managing an opportunity that has no value.
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula:
AND( OR( ISCHANGED( SBQQ__RenewalForecast__c), ISCHANGED( SBQQ__RenewalQuoted__c) ),
NOT(ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Opportunity__r.SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Type__c , 'Renewal')), NOT(ISPICKVAL( SBQQ__Opportunity__r.SBQQ__PrimaryQuote__r.SBQQ__Type__c , 'Amendment')),
Demo_Opp__c == TRUE )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: This contract is for a demo unit. This contract is not eligible for renewal.
